mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(AL.CON_ID,C.CON_ID) AS CON_ID , IFNULL(DL0.DL_CD_NM , "신규") AS ALT_DIV , IFNULL(AL.ALT_CON_DATE , C.CON_FST_DATE) AS ALT_CON_DATE , IFNULL(AL.CON_ST_DATE , C.CON_ST_DATE) AS CON_ST_DATE , IFNULL(AL.CON_ED_DATE , C.CON_ED_DATE) AS CON_ED_DATE , IFNULL(AL.SUPP_AMT , C.SUPP_AMT) AS SUPP_AMT , IFNULL(AL.VAT_AMT , C.VAT_AMT) AS VAT_AMT , IFNULL(AL.REMARK , C.REMARK) AS REMARK , IFNULL(AL.CONFIRM_YN , C.CONFIRM_YN) AS CONFIRM_YN , IFNULL(AL.CON_NO , C.CON_NO) AS CON_NO , CU.CUST_NM FROM BM_CON_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_ALT AL ON C.CON_ID = AL.CON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CUST_INFO CU ON C.CUST_ID = CU.CUST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON AL.ALT_DIV = DL0.DL_CD WHERE C.CON_ID = #{value} ORDER BY CON_ED_DATE DESC
